title: Thief Update v1.2 icl.DLC-RELOADED
description:
Thief Update v1.2 with DLC (c) SQUARE ENIX
   
       03/2014 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam
             - :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Action, Adventure
  
                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                    
                                                                           

 Note: this releases updates your game to v1.2 (build 4116.4). A list of
 updates is included within the pack. You do not need any other update.
 For some reason this patch moves game exe to the Binaries2 dir, if you need
 to change your custom shortcuts or run it manually.
 
 The following DLCs are also unlocked:
 
 * The Bank Heist
 * The Predator Booster Pack
 * The Opportunist Booster Pack
 * The Ghost Booster Pack
 * The Moira Asylum Challenge
 
 If you're having trouble getting the DLCs to work, read the instructions
 below carefully.
 
 --
 
 Garrett, the Master Thief, steps out of the shadows into the City. In this
 treacherous place, where the Baron's Watch spreads a rising tide of fear
 and oppression, his skills are the only things he can trust. Even the most
 cautious citizens and their best-guarded possessions are not safe from his
 reach.
 
 As an uprising emerges, Garrett finds himself entangled in growing layers of
 conflict. Lead by Orion, the voice of the people, the tyrannized citizens
 will do everything they can to claim back the City from the Baron's grasp.
 The revolution is inevitable. If Garrett doesn't get involved, the streets
 will run red with blood and the City will tear itself apart. 

 Garrett never paid the price for anything. until now.

                                                                                                
                                                                                                                             
                                                                                           

 1. Unrar.
 2. Install the update to where you installed the game. 
 3. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory to your game
    install directory.
 4. Play the game.
 
 Additional DLC instructions:
 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
 If you're having trouble getting DLCs to work, perform the following steps:
 1. Delete file Profile.sav (c:ProgramDataSteamRLD!239160storage)
 2. Use the registry editor (start regedit.exe) to remove the following key:
    HKEY_CURRENT_USERSoftwareEidos MontrealThiefInstalledDLC
 3. Firewall the game exe(s) or otherwise prevent the game from going online.
 4. Start the game. The DLCs should appear. If not, go to 1. This game is
    pretty buggy 
 
 Enjoy!
